website_summaries.verdict: Easy to string, bright, and versatile. Many consumers prefer affordable, traditional lights, and this strand is by far the most cost-effective.
pros: A basic strand of 100 white lights that compliments almost any holiday decor
Can be used indoors and outdoors
cons: The bulbs are small and burn outs of one or more at a time are common

customer_reviews.title: Burned continuously for about 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Strong, weather resistant, and very long-lasting. I strung 6 strands through the wisteria and roses and clematis and up in the crepe myrtle tree in the back garden for an amazing year-round, magical effect. They transformed the garden in the evenings and I could rarely bring myself to turn them off at night. They were switched off sometimes but they burned almost continuously in the heat and cold and rain - no snow - until they started blinking out after about 18 months. I'm happily replacing every strand plus a few more. The light is slightly golden - not white - and is ideal for subtle twinkles and glow.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Judd

customer_reviews.title: Not staying lit up for me..:(
customer_reviews.text: These would have been amazing, but 1/4 of the strand doesn't light up after only being used for an hour. I already have them wound into a back yard lighting situation in one of my trees, so I can't return them without undoing the ENTIRE batch of lights that I have on the tree, so I suppose I just have to deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: have these to help light up my room cause its dark af in here. one of my strings died so i bought these to replace them. have had them for 4 months and there's only 2 dead bulbs. keep in mind i have these lights on a lot because im an extreme night owl and i never leave my room. edit: so i got these in sept of 2016, its now feb 20th 2017 and half the lights just went out, so they lasted almost 6 months, not bad but im going to buy a different brand now to see if they do any better. my room is very dark now while i wait for my new lights lol
customer_reviews.author: MoonTiaraMagic

customer_reviews.title: FIRE DANGER!!!!!  SMOKING LIGHTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got my tree all ready to put the lights on that I had purchased . One section of the string was not lit , so I began checking to see if any lights missing. One was and I replaced it. Lights still didn't work so I went one by one to see if they were in properly. When I pushed on one it began smoking and I quickly removed the plug. It actually burned my finger. I am so thankful that the lights were not on my tree when they malfunctioned or the results could have been catastrophic!!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Lasts one year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these exactly one year ago and every single light is burnt out except for a few. I haven't counted them but looks to be about 3 or 4. They look good while they last. I have bought some in the past that never burnt out. These are used year around for an indoor artificial ficus tree.
customer_reviews.author: kimfl

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: If you're putting these on a tree, 100 won't get you far. Be sure to get at least a 200 count. I used 300 total for my tree.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work even after replacing broken lights
customer_reviews.text: Received it and it didn't work. Okay fine. Play around with all the bulbs, still didn't work. Replaced a few of the ones with broken connectors or whatever they are, still didn't work. The fact that I paid a little extra for shipping, and checked all the lights and it still didn't work is pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Half the lights cut out after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: These lights look great and worked great for about two months. After I use them daily to light up my room but after not using them for a few days, half of the lights cut out.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Brightens up my stair case w/ out a glare
customer_reviews.text: I use them as night lights on my stair case for my mom and dog who can't see well in the dark. They are just enough to gently eluminate the 13 steps but wouldn't replace a 40 watt bulb (I'll guess half that bright). The string went down the steps once and up once with a little left over to make a touch brighter at the top. All the lights worked in both boxes I purchased. Why only 4 stars? 'cause they were too expensive at over $8 a box. They also have a standard plug at the end to plug in aother set of lights.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: First of all these are very cheap looking and they feel cheap as well. I am unable to return them....not sure why. I bought the wrong color light and it doesn’t match my othe lights. Very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I loved these for my dorm bed. They fit just right around my twin size and provided a decent amount of light (not too bright , not too dim)
customer_reviews.author: Anaiya Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done and withstood the elements
customer_reviews.text: These were a good deal and I was surprised that they worked right away upon plugging in. No dead bulbs, nice and bright, and very festive. But not too festive, but festive enough without going overboard. You don't want to be "that guy". Anyway, I've had these outside year-round for almost two years and they have withstood any inclement weather well. They still work when plugged in and that's all you can ask for you. You can ask for more but we're talking about lights here.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, packaging was simple, & lights are durable. No issues with the product. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great decor lighting
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 packages of these lights for my planter shelving in my kitchen. They are perfect for wrapping around my existing grapevines. They are well made, and light up in a soft romantic white color, which is exactly what I wanted. They look great check out my pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: Loved these bright lights!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these lights as a cheaper alternative to globe lights for out outdoor party. They did the job perfectly. The lights were very long and we used 2 boxed to completely string across our canopy. They were very bright, well packaged and nice and durable. We had no problems at all with these. Will be using them for a long time to come!
customer_reviews.author: Christina V.

customer_reviews.title: I love the (somewhat) amber light from these lights
customer_reviews.text: I love the (somewhat) amber light from these lights. They are not the super blue-ish bright light of most LEDs. Very comfortable light. Bright, but not annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Linx

customer_reviews.title: OoOo pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lights :) just the right amount of length! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Totally Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I keep replacement lights. There were at LEAST 5 lights that didn't work - therefore the entire string wouldn't work. Not worth the money. Would have bought lights a lot cheaper elsewhere and not on line, but with it being summer time, there were none available in the stores - walmart, etc. Will never buy lights on line again. Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Last Very Long
customer_reviews.text: I use these lights on an artificial ficus tree. They look nice but only last about 3 months. I've had to replace them 3 times already. I've tried replacing the fuses to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Not my real name

customer_reviews.title: Can't return this item?
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally purchased this item when I already had a larger set of lights coming. It was on a not returnable list for me. Proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Dillard

customer_reviews.title: colored lights bad
customer_reviews.text: only had the colored string up a week and the entire string went out
customer_reviews.author: M. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dorm or other room mood lighting. Green wire - be sure you know that as sometimes people want white wire for matching paint. Green was perfect for me, so this is great. Lights still working after two years. Some reviews say that lights stopped working soon after purchase. This is an "update" to my first review, and lights are used daily and have been moved/re-installed several times and work perfectly. (First review published a year after purchasing.)
customer_reviews.author: nausetsunrise

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my old lights which lasted for years. I put them on my terrace, and about a month later... half of the lights were blown. Dont buy
customer_reviews.author: Duval F.  Adams

customer_reviews.title: LOVE BUT BREAK
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights but they don't last long. Often half the strand burns out.
customer_reviews.author: Lizabeth D. Lalich

customer_reviews.title: Christmas lights... not much to say.
customer_reviews.text: The lights were competitively priced and suited my needs quite well. Thank goodness for Amazon, where one can purchase Christmas lights any day of the year!
customer_reviews.author: JillHdz

customer_reviews.title: No return for not lighting up?
customer_reviews.text: It only half lit but it says no return? Why?
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.text: Good lights but burnout fairly quick. But they are one 24/7 as have them strung up along the fire place for decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These lights are great! They have lasted a long time on an ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great! They have lasted a long time on an indoor tree and are actually white unlike some that have a yellow cast. I ordered 3 more sets to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stouffer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly this holiday season! I misjudged what Length I'd need, so I'll probably buy another set next Christmas so I don't have to get creative again.
customer_reviews.author: SwtNdSpcy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and pretty cost effective. I used it indoors so i don’t know about outside use.
customer_reviews.author: Noodle head RN

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Definitely!
customer_reviews.text: Used these on our Christmas tree. It’s been working perfectly since about 15 days. Included some extra leds in the box which is nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: One String That Acts Like Two
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these lights as as good as any, especially when you consider that the same factory in China probably manufactures these for every brand on the market. My only complaint is that this single string of 100 lights is actually 2ea 50 light strings connected together. As such, there is absolutely no way to make all 100 bulbs blink at the same time. The 2 strings act independently - not at all what I needed or wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Spence

customer_reviews.title: I got these as additional lights for a pre-lit Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: This 100-count Christmas-tree light set is about 25 feet long. It's a great multi-purpose light set which can be used both indoors and outdoors. The box makes the lights look as if they will be pure white, but they are more of an off-white tending toward light-gold when they are turned on. They are an excellent adjunct to the lights already on my pre-lit Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: Kate McMurryTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Christmas lights as an accessory to kitchen lighting.
customer_reviews.text: I use clear Christmas lights over the top of my kitchen cabinets to give that reflective lighting in the evening. I put both new strings I purchased up and in less that a week one string was out. I was under the impression with the extra bulbs I could replace those that were out, however that was impossible as I only had 2-3 bulbs on hand to replace over half the string. Not sure it is the product since I have not plugged up the other side to see how long it last. Love the cost and the time of the year for purchasing as it is difficult to walk in a store and purchase Christmas lights in March/April.
customer_reviews.author: Kayron D. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Just right for lighting the patio for summer evening barbeques with music & friends...
customer_reviews.text: Great decorative string lights. Low price. I use them on my patio. Great mood lighting, and they cast ample light to forgo the basic 75 watt incandescent porch light. BONUS FEATURE ! They don't draw mosquitos much ! Huge deal in my neck of the woods where the little devils are a real problem......
customer_reviews.author: Dan Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I have these around my yard. They give a nice gold glow. My neighbors complemented me on them.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Works well with any DIY project!
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my artificial trees by the front door! They illuminate at just the right brightness!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda F. OGuin

customer_reviews.title: Make my office look very festive
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten so many compliments on the lights in my office! Granted, they could be any set of lights, but these are the ones I have and they have worked out very well so far! They are just around my desk, but they seem very long and tough. One light did burn out almost immediately, but the rest have been fine (and they stayed on even though it was out).
customer_reviews.author: Hollydazzle

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: These lights went completely out only a few months of use. Not worth the money or any amount for that matter
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Does not handle weather very good at all
customer_reviews.text: Does not handle weather very good at all. Might get a month out of them in inclement weather conditions. I am in Ohio though so the weather goes up and down considerably at during season changes.
customer_reviews.author: Tim oliver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. I needed a strand of Christmas lights in March, Amazon delivered just that. They are a little pricey compared to what I can buy them for during the holiday season though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: Love these - I leave them up on my balcony year round! They last for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Ellen Nocero

customer_reviews.title: All dead after little over one month
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on Tuesday January 8, 2013 - some went dead last week - all went dead last night (Sunaday, February 10, 2013). Differnt lights I got in Costco lasted almost two years
customer_reviews.author: Emilian

customer_reviews.title: Bad bad bad
customer_reviews.text: The product is different from description. The cord is white, but nit green. Not eligible for returns. Scammers!
customer_reviews.author: Azary W.

customer_reviews.title: Lights did not last very long
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a plant in my dining room they already burnt out.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: My birds are happy again in the metal tree
customer_reviews.text: I was super sad when half the lights went out on my tree. It looked sad. I ordered these and they are refreshing. Super white and light. Now makes my other half look dull.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Rich Dwyer-lewis

customer_reviews.title: Mike P
customer_reviews.text: Some of my lights broke over the holidays. I'll be using these to repair some displays before I pack them away for next season's use. They arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our event, and right on time! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lenette M. Werber

customer_reviews.title: Not as described!
customer_reviews.text: Description says 24.75feet. What I received is 22.65 feet. Luckily it still worked for my size patio so I chose not to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad to be able to purchase them in the "off"
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights to decorate a shelf over my sliding doors. I have ive intwined with the lights with my birdhouse collectio. I am so glad to be able to purchase them in the "off" season
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Porada

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality lights
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights and do what they should. What is nice though is that they are spaced tightly. We had a fence in our backyard lit up with them and I asked my wife to take one strand off, that we didn't need to double-up on the strands. She told me they were not doubled, that was just one single strand.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Used for one Christmas, next time took out of the box none of them are working
customer_reviews.author: Golden

customer_reviews.title: Never-ending supply of Christmas lights...
customer_reviews.text: 'Seems like every year, most all the "new" Christmas light strands are bad - even with putting them away the year before all working. (Hmmmmm) These were a good replacement for the never-ending task of replenishing the numberous strands we use. Good price - fast service. What more can I say.
customer_reviews.author: justaconsumer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It has been years since I bought these and they still work.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Schlottman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my outdoor patio!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the potted trees on my outdoor patio. They work great and look fabulous. I've been using them for about a month now. I wanted white lights, but I didn't have time to go shopping all over the place to try to find them "in summer." So I was happy to get them from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Wreath looks great. The set included extra bulbs and batteries
customer_reviews.text: I had a Christmas wreath with 50 lights that no longer worked. Removed the old lights and added the 100 count. Wreath looks great. The set included extra bulbs and batteries. The price was very affordable. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Cook

customer_reviews.title: I love the warmth they add to the space
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my balcony year-round. I love the warmth they add to the space.
customer_reviews.author: Kimi Rose

customer_reviews.title: I read some bad reviews on these but I've had them up for ...
customer_reviews.text: I read some bad reviews on these but I've had them up for three weeks on my tree and they seem to be doing well. Hopefully they'll last, if not, i'll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: I love this! I received this last night and put ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I received this last night and put it on balancing and it looks so pretty. I’ll buy this again soon once Christmas season is here.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya Rose

customer_reviews.title: These lights were perfect for decorating my room
customer_reviews.text: These lights were perfect for decorating my room. I would have given five stars but there were challenges with getting the entire strand to light. When I first plugged them in, half of the strand was dead. I tried to fix it by replacing the first light and the middle light on the dead strand. nothing. So then I just shook the strand, trying to touch all the lights to see if a little jiggle would make it flicker, and it did. I touched each light individually, twisting them, and finally found the one that triggered them all to light. About 30 minutes of frustration.. not bad. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Ciera Culcasi

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid strand of lights for a good price online. You can probably get them a bit cheaper going to a store but only save a few bucks. I've had a number of these strands for a couple years now (indoors) and they work great. Not a single strand has gone out.
customer_reviews.author: commish22

customer_reviews.title: You brighten my Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: It was just the length that I needed. They put the finishing touches to my Christmas tree. The lights are clear and they have a perfect shine. I love them so much. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: krankenhaus 63

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No issues so far. I got two and it was more than enough for my small, 3' tree
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Screwed up!
customer_reviews.text: These would have been perfect, except I ordered two boxes and one of the strings was ALL WHTE!!! What the heck?!?!? It shows green on the box, says green in the description, one of them was perfect and green...then you go and give me a WHITE string box. How am I supposed to use those together?? Common sense people!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Half of the string didn’t work. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Great for older hallmark ornament power.
customer_reviews.text: The lights worked great. Needed them to power a Hallmark ornament from 1995.
customer_reviews.author: mrcoachkline

customer_reviews.title: Night light 22ft long
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my 4 year old sons room. He can't wait to set them up. Using them as a night light.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Layla

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights in early April, mainly based on reviews of how long lasting they were. However, by May we'd had so many burned out bulbs that there were not enough replacement bulbs to fix them all. By June the second half of the string stopped working completely. So, in less than 2 months the lights had to be taken down. Not worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: E. Amell

customer_reviews.title: Lights did not work Took my money with no service
customer_reviews.text: I put five star so someone would not make a mistake Like I did !!!!!!! I received the light They did not work And was unable to replace or return it Does that make any sense ???
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Ordered quite a few boxes of these holiday lights.
customer_reviews.text: We keep them on our palm tree plants year-round so they burn out quickly. Have had to replace the lights twice already, since the beginning of November but they were affordable and just the right style. They don't get hot to the touch, ever...which was the important part.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Holly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outside wedding, even through a storm!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these lights. I got them for my best friend's backyard wedding and they were the perfect touch. We put them up as soon as they got here, so they had to endure a bad storm we got suddenly, but stayed up, stayed lit, and worked all through the wedding! The length of the line before the lights start is also perfect enough to reach the ceiling. I left these at her house but will definitely get some for me for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Died within 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a while back and recently put them above my kitchen cabinets (to leave on year-round) and half burnt out in about 10-12 hours and the rest were out when i woke the next morning. I've been decorating like this for years so I know there are more quality lights out there.
customer_reviews.author: INlaw

customer_reviews.title: these are as described but I'm' disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Searched for LED lights and should have checked, these are as described but I'm' disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: GLORIA G.

customer_reviews.title: I just think it an overall waste of money when you can find one just like ...
customer_reviews.text: I just think it an overall waste of money when you can find one just like it at a drift store for a dollar. But, its not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Dez Polycarpe

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I used these to re-wire a giant picture-window wreath whose original lights had burned out. They worked great. I left them on from Thanksgiving to 12th Night (January 6th) and every light stayed on. No burn-outs, no "dimmers." Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and durable.  Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: These are great Christmas lights that do what they say they will do. We actually use them year-round on our deck to provide soft lighting. They seem to have lasted for over a year so far - so we would buy them again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: LUCK

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. The lights work but the green wiring is coming unraveled
customer_reviews.author: sarah reynolds

customer_reviews.title: if it's not these are great.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for Christmas lights, but still cheaper than those trendy fairy lights. If it's Christmas time, buy these at your local store, if it's not these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Evergreen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a long time and perfect lenght for a 4 foot tree
customer_reviews.author: Find Paola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the right number of lights and green wiring. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E. Haar

customer_reviews.title: Just your basic lights but they lasted for a pretty long time
customer_reviews.text: Just your basic lights but they lasted for a pretty long time. Good room decor, I put these around one of my tapestries and they looked very nice.
customer_reviews.author: karley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews have stated, they tend to go half hour fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Description Inaccurate - 22.69’ NOT 24.75
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item specifically because of the description listing the length at 24.75 ft. Product arrived and is 22.69 ft. Get your description right or omit that level of detail.
customer_reviews.author: K Eskew

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: burnt out after 6 weeks of light use, not 1, but all 3 sets I bought, 2 sets completely burnt out every bulb, 1 set has 2/3 of the string burnt out
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy

customer_reviews.title: ... the lights worked when I plugged them in absolute waste of money
customer_reviews.text: not even half of the lights worked when I plugged them in absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length!
customer_reviews.text: Love me some Xmas lights -- all throughout the year!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights and they were great for a while but within a year they broke. I bought two sets. One is completely out and the other half burnt out. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. All three strings of light went out after a week. An amazing aggregation when you’ve completely decorated your tree....twice!! Save your money
customer_reviews.author: S Holt

customer_reviews.title: BULBS DIDN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 boxes of these and neither of them worked. We checked the bulbs and the outlets, but neither set would turn on. What a rip-off.
customer_reviews.author: wwbee

customer_reviews.title: Nice while they last....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these August 2012. Clustered them in a colored glass bowl in my kitchen and turned them on only at night for a night light effect. For added protection, they were plugged into a surge protector. By December 2012, half of the lights had burned out, and then the rest burned out mid-January 2013. So mine only had a life of 10 hrs a day for 4 months. The lights these replaced, died out after 4 years of use... wish I could find more of those.
customer_reviews.author: dt

customer_reviews.title: only half lights illuminate
customer_reviews.text: strangely only half the lights illuminate out of the box. Not sure if this is a defect or something else.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Y

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: These didn't stay lit for one week. I was desperate to get some lights before the holidays and you couldn't find them anywhere so I spent a higher price to get these and it didn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Gould

customer_reviews.title: These lights light up my bahroom at night so I don't have to turn on a light
customer_reviews.text: I use them to light up my bathroom They work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Bower   CJB

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for what I need it, however the lights get warm and they aren't very tightly wound
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my Thanksgiving garland. It was the perfect finishing touch and turned it into my favorite decoration!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin K.

customer_reviews.title: Hit or Miss
customer_reviews.text: A couple lights came not working. Got replacements from Amazon and they work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you expect
customer_reviews.text: I would give them 5 stars but now that LED lights are on the market, traditional lights can only get a 4 out of 5. But if you are looking for cheap lights, these are your guys.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C

customer_reviews.title: I guess I should expect bad quality for $8 but not a different length every ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this months ago and again as a replacement this week. It was at least 3 feet shorter. Also 2 complete bulbs were missing. I guess I should expect bad quality for $8 but not a different length every time I order the item.
customer_reviews.author: Emma W

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my classroom. Unfortunately, as soon as I unboxed & plugged them in, only half of the lights were working.
